description: A 10-step implementation plan for MyProject's security features and threat intelligence capabilities.

steps.title: Core Infrastructure Setup
steps.description: Set up the foundational infrastructure for the security monitoring system.
tasks: Configure secure credential storage using the .env system
Establish database connections for threat intelligence storage
Set up logging infrastructure for security events
Configure basic authentication for API endpoints
Implement rate limiting for all external-facing services

steps.title: API Integration Framework
steps.description: Implement the framework for integrating with external security and threat intelligence APIs.
tasks: Develop the API integration base classes
Create the API health monitoring system
Set up automatic API status dashboard updates
Implement Gemini API integration for AI-enhanced analysis

steps.title: Threat Intelligence Collection
steps.description: Implement systems for collecting and processing threat intelligence from various sources.
tasks: Create data parsers for various intelligence formats
Implement data validation and cleaning processes

steps.title: Data Storage and Indexing
steps.description: Build robust storage solutions for threat intelligence data with efficient indexing for rapid searching.
tasks: Implement database schema for threat intelligence storage
Create indexing system for rapid IOC lookups
Develop data compression for historical intelligence
Set up backup and recovery procedures

steps.title: Correlation Engine Development
steps.description: Develop the advanced correlation engine for identifying relationships between threat indicators.
tasks: Create TTP (Tactics, Techniques, and Procedures) identification logic
Implement machine learning models for anomaly detection

steps.title: API Development
steps.description: Build comprehensive REST APIs for accessing the threat intelligence system.
tasks: Develop IOC checking and submission endpoints

steps.title: Dashboard Development
steps.description: Create interactive and informative dashboards for monitoring threat intelligence and API status.
tasks: Design and implement threat intelligence dashboard
Develop API status dashboard with real-time updates

steps.title: Alert System Implementation
steps.description: Develop an advanced alerting system for critical security events and indicators.
tasks: Create notification delivery mechanisms (email, SMS, etc.)
Develop alert aggregation logic to prevent flooding

steps.title: Automated Reporting
steps.description: Implement systems for generating comprehensive security reports and threat assessments.

steps.title: Testing and Deployment
steps.description: Conduct thorough testing and prepare the system for production deployment.
tasks: Conduct load testing for high-volume scenarios
Perform security validation of all components

metrics.notes: This implementation plan focuses on building a robust security monitoring and threat intelligence platform. Each step builds upon previous ones, and the plan is designed to be executed sequentially. Regular progress reviews are recommended after each step completion.
